overview:
Product Director, Software Development Director, System Architect, with a primary focus on Supply Chain, Transportation Logistics, and Strategic Sourcing. Currently involved in everything from product portfolio mgt, to SaaS application development, to professional services, and process improvement.

In depth experience in dealing with the needs of large international companies in North America, Europe and Asia. Particularly interested in solving product development challenges encountered by multi-national global user bases.

Goals include: SaaS platform integration and consolidation, Productizing our Logistics Sourcing module and Optimization engine, Continuing to work on international Supply Chain projects, Integrating two Supply Chain platforms into Elemica’s cloud-based platform of the future!

Specialties Global Supply Chain experience dealing with the tire, rubber and chemical industries. Specifics include: Vendor Managed Inventory, Transportation and Logistics, Certificate of Analysis and Customs Clearing, Just-in-Time ordering (particularly in Asia)

Transportation Logistics Sourcing: Ocean Freight, Trucking and Heavy Air. Constraint-based Optimization.

Software technologies: Cloud platform design, Java, J2EE SaaS development, GWT 1.6, EJB3/JPA, AJAX/JSON Web 2.0, Ruby, SQLServer, Groovy.
